Meaning: We already know (can say) the poem by heart.
You can (are welcome to) do it.
You must / have to drink a lot of water.
We had to write a couple of letters.
You don't have to speak so quietly.
Sentence: Ihr müsst nicht so leise sprechen.

Meaning: I don't have to do it at all.
I must (go to) see a doctor.
I'd like to know it, too.
Would you like to see something?
Is it supposed to be a joke?
I should (go to) see a doctor.
